statements: SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data
SELECT feedback FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY performance_rating DESC
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating < 3;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, feedback FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE feedback LIKE '%improved%';
SELECT * FROM RemoteEmployees;
SELECT employee_name, remote_work_hours FROM RemoteEmployees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE remote_work_hours > 30;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceFeedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT employee_name, feedback_text FROM RemoteEmployees JOIN PerformanceFeedback ON RemoteEmployees.employee_id = PerformanceFeedback.employee_id ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, remote_work_hours FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE remote_work_hours > 40;
SELECT employee_name, remote_work_hours, performance_rating FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE employee_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM RemoteEmployees WHERE remote_work_hours < 30 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_name, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM RemoteEmployees JOIN PerformanceFeedback ON RemoteEmployees.employee_id = PerformanceFeedback.employee_id;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_name, feedback_date FROM RemoteEmployees LEFT JOIN PerformanceFeedback ON RemoteEmployees.employee_id = PerformanceFeedback.employee_id WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating, feedback FROM employee_performance_data;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 10 ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data WHERE performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM employee_performance_data INNER JOIN employee_feedback ON employee_performance_data.employee_id = employee_feedback.employee_id

SELECT * FROM employee_performance_data JOIN performance_evaluations ON employee_performance_data.employee_id = performance_evaluations.employee_id WHERE performance_evaluations.performance_rating < 3
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM employee_feedback GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_feedback_count > 2
SELECT MAX(evaluation_date) AS latest_evaluation_date, AVG(performance_rating) AS average_rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceData;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceData WHERE performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE evaluation_score < 60;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM PerformanceFactors ORDER BY weight DESC;
SELECT employee_name, evaluation_date FROM PerformanceEvaluation ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceData WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, performance_rating FROM EmployeePerformanceData WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM PerformanceFactors WHERE weight BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY weight ASC;

SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date, employee_name, evaluation_score FROM PerformanceEvaluation LEFT JOIN EmployeePerformanceData ON PerformanceEvaluation.employee_id = EmployeePerformanceData.employee_id;
SELECT factor_name, weight, description FROM PerformanceFactors WHERE factor_name LIKE '%Communication%' ORDER BY factor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, department, hire_date FROM Employees WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY name;
SELECT review_date, rating, feedback FROM PerformanceReviews WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY review_date;
SELECT topic, duration_minutes FROM Meetings WHERE meeting_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY duration_minutes DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, hire_date, rating FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Employees;
SELECT name, department, rating FROM Employees WHERE rating > 3 AND department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM PerformanceReviews GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
